title: Microsoft | Sr. Machine Learning Engineer L64 | Hyderabad| Offer evaluation
content:
Education: M.Tech Tier I (Core)
Years of Experience: 8+
Prior Experience: Product based health care startup (Lead Engineer)
Current CTC: 48L + 1L (Base + Variable)
_______
Date of the Offer: May 1, 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: Sr. ML Engineer - L64
Location: Hyderabad
Fixed Salary: 58L
Signing Bonus: 0L
Relocation Bonus: 2.2L + 5L
Stock bonus: $80K for 4 years
Perf Bonus: Upto 30% of base, considering 15% ~ 8.7L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 83.4L
Benefits: Standard MS benefits
___
Competing Offers: -
___ 
I feel that the stocks are on a lower side for the L64. 
What should be the stock range for L64 ?
Overall, Is this a good offer?
How is the WLB?
Please help me in evaluating the offer.

title: Rippling | Senior Software Engineer - L7 | Bangalore
content:

**Company**: Rippling

**Location**: Bengaluru, India
